plays.text: Penalty to Mike Johnson 2 minutes for Tripping Marcus Ragnarsson
Penalty to Shane Doan 2 minutes for Holding Mike Rathje
Goal scored by Mike Rathje assisted by Patrick Marleau and Scott Thornton
Goal scored by Mike Ricci assisted by Adam Graves and Niklas Sundstrom
Penalty to Mike Rathje 2 minutes for Interference Ladislav Nagy
Penalty to Marco Sturm 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Sean Burke
Penalty to Drake Berehowsky 2 minutes for Roughing Marco Sturm
Penalty to Scott Thornton 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Scott Thornton 2 minutes for Interference Teppo Numminen
Penalty to Ladislav Nagy 2 minutes for Slashing Owen Nolan
Penalty to Marcus Ragnarsson 2 minutes for Holding Brian Savage
Penalty to Gary Suter 2 minutes for Holding Mike Johnson
Goal scored by Radoslav Suchy assisted by Daniel Briere and Mike Johnson
Penalty to Krystofer Kolanos 2 minutes for Interference(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Branko Radivojevic 2 minutes for High Sticking Bryan Marchment
